About-
Created a Quiz app.

Tech stack used:
1.HTML
2.Tailwind css
3.Javascript

How to use?
The app having very easy and user friendly interface.
once you open a app you have a queston on your screen with some options.-
step-1 select your answer or skip the question in case you don't want to answer.
step-2 click on the next button.

follow the above two steps,until you reach the last question.Once you reach the last question of the quiz the next button turned into a submit button.

step-3 click on the submit button to check your score.

The Quiz end with your score and a greeting message.
